glsa.title: Thin: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability was discovered in Thin which may allow local attackers to kill arbitrary processes (denial of service).

background.p: Thin is a small and fast Ruby web server.

description.p: It was discovered that Gentooâ€™s Thin ebuild does not properly handle its temporary runtime directories. This only affects OpenRC systems, as the flaw was exploitable via the init script.

impact.p: A local attacker could cause denial of service by killing arbitrary processes.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: Gentoo has discontinued support for Thin. We recommend that users unmerge Thin:

NOTE: The Gentoo developer(s) maintaining Thin have discontinued support at this time. It may be possible that a new Gentoo developer will update Thin at a later date. There are many other web servers available in the tree in the www-servers category.
